name: typecast-array
description: Automatically cast configuration Objects into complex data types through normal Array operations like push, unshift, and more!
author: Elliot Chong <code+typecast-array@elliotjameschong.com>

scripts.test-browser: echo 'Navigate to http://localhost:2222 to execute tests' && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -t coffeeify --extension='.coffee' -t ractivate --extension='.html' ./test | ./node_modules/.bin/browser-run -p 2222 | ./node_modules/.bin/faucet
